title: Count to 500 Before Riot Staff Posts
body: EDIT: Not allowed so which champions do you want to see a rework on? Personally I'd like Fiddlesticks to get reworked.

replies.body: Sorry friend. Not this time. How is everybody doing today?

> Sorry friend. Not this time. How is everybody doing today?

Possible to edit the title to this:
Champion Rework Discussion (Ideas, etc)
Here, I have typed up to 10,000. GG Rito
